name: Santa's escape (Liatutim)
description:
Santa's escape is a VR escape room experience, where you need to help Santa get out of this house.

In order to do so, you must solve riddles hiding within this innocent-looking bedroom and find a way out!

be careful, you only have 15 minutes before the sun rises and morning comes, and if you won't escape by then, Christmas will be ruined forever..


The game is designed for a VR head set, best played in Oculus Quest 2.

use the 2 hand controllers: forward on the right-hand joystick to cast a ray, back button to select or grab. almost everything is interactable and can respond to player's gestures and touch.

> Development: Liat Refaeli, Artume Pichersky, Natalie Kern Iacob

> Music and sounds: Itamar Haggai
